section.title: Prereqs
section.para: What you need installed before installing xsupplicant

section.title: Running the configure script
section.para:
The following configuration options are available for xsupplicant:
(We should probably stick this information in a nicely formatted table)
--enable-eap-sim - Enables EAP SIM authentication. (REQUIRES EXTERNAL LIBRARY) --enable-card-reset - Enables card resets when roaming. --enable-static-openssl - Statically link OpenSSL into the xsupplicant binary. --with-ossl-root - Specify the path to the directory holding the OpenSSL source tree.

section.title: make && make install
section.para: this should always work if the configure script runs to completion, but if there are problems, see the next section.

section.title: When things go wrong.
section.para: if anything doesn't work, then here's the todo list for fixing the problem. basically, I will say 1) double check prereqs, fix as needed 2) email list with specific information about the problem.
